block.title: A - E
block.description: The letters A - E only use the top 4 dots in each cell.

letter.letter_desc: The letter A has dot 1 only, because A is the first letter of the alphabet. Try to touch dot 1!
The letter B has dots 1 and 4. Try to touch dot 1!

block.title: F - J
block.description: The letters F - J use a different set of dots.

letter.letter_desc: The letter F has dot 6 only.
The letter G has dots 6 and 9.

The letter G has dots 6 and 9.
The letter F has dot 6 only.
